name: Association for Better European Access to Nutrients
goal:
ABEAN aims at becoming a privileged spokesperson for the European Institutions, Member States and industry players.
ABEAN brings and maintains issues related to nutrients high on the agenda of European decision-makers, including the European Commission and the governments of the Member States.
ABEAN provides unbiased support on fertiliser topics to political, technical and industrial circles in Brussels as well as in European capitals, in the interest of the fertiliser sector and farmers.
ABEAN benefits from a global and regional expertise on the agriculture and fertiliser industry, from raw materials mining and transformation to distribution and spreading, combined with an in-depth experience of the EU institutions’ mechanisms.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Fertilisers' EU regulatory developments;
CAP post 2020;
Trade developments with third countries;
Taxation issues;
Competition cases;
General EU topics.
